title: Dirty Girl's 2 Dirty Men
description: A taboo love that spans TWO generations...They say that those who are adopted sometimes come with certain "issues". This couldn't be more true for 18-year-old Beth, who's infatuated with the idea of "having her way" with ALLLL the closest men in her life. When Beth goes to spend the summer with a MUCH older man, she decides it's the perfect opportunity to surrender her innocence to someone older, wiser and innumerably more experienced. The man of the house is in for the shock of his life when Beth returns from her summer of forbidden passion, only to find out that he's NEXT!** 7500+ naughty, taboo words that will leave you BURNING hot! **
author: Sarah Sethline
